scripts.test-publish:e2e: playwright test tests/admin/admin-content-*.spec.ts tests/admin/admin-comms-*.spec.ts tests/api/api-content-*.spec.ts tests/api/api-comms.spec.ts --grep-invert @quarantine
scripts.test-contracts: vitest run tests/contracts --reporter=verbose && playwright test tests/contracts --grep-invert @quarantine --workers=2
scripts.green: npm run typecheck && npm run lint && npm run test:guardrails && npm run test:unit
scripts.green:e2e: npm run db:seed && npm run test-admin:stable && npm run test-api:stable
scripts.green:full: npm run green && npm run green:e2e
scripts.explain:green:
node -e "console.log('
=== npm run green ===

Fast, deterministic gate (~30-60s):
  1. typecheck  - TypeScript compilation
  2. lint       - ESLint checks
  3. guardrails - Auth/impersonation safety
  4. test:unit  - Vitest unit tests (including contracts)

Does NOT run (use green:e2e or green:full):
  - Playwright browser tests (slow, need db:seed)
  - Database seeding

Docs: docs/CI/GREEN_GATE.md
')"
scripts.reviewer:quickcheck:
echo '
=== Reviewer Quickcheck ===

What to verify in the PR:
  1. Risk level selected (Low/Medium/High)
  2. For Medium/High: Invariants section completed
  3. For Medium/High: Proof of safety section completed
  4. Hotspot plan if hotspots touched

Key docs:
  - docs/CI/REVIEWER_QUICKSTART.md (2-min guide)
  - docs/CI/SAFETY_NET.md (defense layers)
  - docs/CI/PR_REVIEW_CHECKLIST.md (full checklist)
  - docs/CI/INVARIANTS.md (security invariants)

Commands to run:
  npm run green           # Full verification
  npm run test:guardrails # Security checks only
  npm run test-contracts  # Contract tests only
  npm run typecheck       # Type check only
'
